article_title: It's Time For President Obama To Begin Legacy Shopping On Trade Issues

article_metadata.author: Doug Schoen

og.description: Without question, President Obama’s second term will ultimately be defined on how he rallies the American people to protect our national security interests, both here at home and overseas. The rise of ISIS and other crises in the Middle East, have rightfully demanded the president’s attention and political leadership that [...]
